topics.body:
Today in my exploration of the LoE enforcement community I got mods mad for direct linking images out of /mlp/. None of NSFW, but it still got them way worked up.

Their "Concrete reasoning" to being mad being they simply don't like them. Never mind it's safe, no vulgarity, no guns.

My mission to break them or get banned trying continues. Let the nerds come to heel or end me.

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539e584b63687221b9000000#post_539e584b63687221b9000000

It was in their live-chat box. So it got swept away in the waves of text and deleted. I would link if I could. But I save the ex-script. Though, just because I'm polite I'll remove their names.

<Mod 1> [07:57 pm]: also AaronMk please keep your link locations from apropriate sites
<User 1> [07:57 pm]: i mean i dont what your talking about .. i knew you would come back :ajshifty:
<User 2> [07:58 pm]: We should make a goodbye drawing for ryo on his last day :D
<User 3> [07:58 pm]: I knew you would come back too :ajshifty: *hides ballons*
<User 4> [07:59 pm]: Enjoy your 2 weeks of peace, free from looking at this oblivious chatbox
AaronMk [07:59 pm]: It's direct. I could have just posted the Satyr Thread. Even if it doesn't ever get near a quarter bad as you kids think.
<User 4> [08:00 pm]: Dude, its from 4chan.
<User 4> [08:00 pm]: Just dont
AaronMk [08:00 pm]: Dude
AaronMk [08:00 pm]: It's clean
<Mod 1> [08:00 pm]: Even if the material is inocent the site is not
AaronMk [08:00 pm]: Don't get wound up.
AaronMk [08:00 pm]: It's not like it'll change to Read the forum rules! or anything.
<Mod 1>[08:00 pm]: Just do not use that site as refrance and listen to the mods
AaronMk [08:01 pm]: You ain't controlling my browsing habits now are you?


"For reference, this was the 'offending' image.":https://i.4cdn.org/mlp/1402803516627.png

I also posted something else out of Satyr too I think, but I can't recall which picture. But both were SFW. But it feels like they're trying really hard to ignore they exist.
